English: Three Sovereigns, between Gods and Emperors in third millennium BC
francais: Les trois Augustes et les cinq Empereurs

English: Three Sovereigns, between Gods and Emperors in third millennium BC
usually listed as Suiren `燧~`人~[Sui4 ren2], Fuxi `伏羲~[Fu2 Xi1], trapping and writing, Shennong or Farmer God `神~`農~|`神~农[Shen2 nong2]
francais: Les trois Augustes et les cinq Empereurs
